hero.title: From Hong Kong to The Hague: The Arrest of Rodrigo Roa Duterte (Full Documentary) | ABS-CBN News
hero.description: From Hong Kong to The Hague: The Arrest of Rodrigo Roa Duterte is a 2025 documentary by journalist Katrina Domingo that traces the events that unfolded on March 11, 2025 when former Philippines president Rodrigo Duterte was arrested in  “Oplan Tugis” (Operation Plan Pursuit) under an International Criminal Court warrant with charges for crimes against humanity related to the former executive’s drug war.

primary.title: 2025 elections: What the Senate would look like if surveys prove true
primary.description: Manila, Philippines—There are 66 candidates for 12 seats in the Senate, considered as the upper chamber of Congress that has the duty to uplift lives, especially of the poor, through legislation.

secondary.title: Pasig congressional bet in hot water over single mom joke
secondary.description: A Congressional candidate in Pasig City, who went viral for a sexually charged joke about single mothers, is currently in hot water after the Commission on Elections (Comelec) issued a show cause order against him.

secondary.title: Willie Revillame reminded of senator's mandate after 'bigyan ng jacket' joke
secondary.description: Television host Willie Revillame was reminded of a senator's mandate following his joke about giving 'jackets' if he ever faced conflicts in the upper chamber.

secondary.title: Detained in The Hague, Duterte Pursues a Political Comeback at Home
secondary.description: Rodrigo Duterte, the former Philippine president who is facing charges of crimes against humanity, is running for mayor in a race analysts say he could win.

carousel.title: Unfinished project: Portraits, stories of women fighting for divorce in the Philippines
carousel.description: It could have been the first documentary photography exhibition on the controversial issue of divorce. I did not know it at the time, but the silent power of the Catholic Church on divorce indirectly reaches the walls of arts institutions.

carousel.title: Marawi math prodigy bound for MIT after dominating academics
carousel.description: A Moro student from Marawi City—known for his exceptional talent in mathematics, physics, chemistry, and statistics—is set to pursue higher education at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) after winning top awards in national and international Olympiads.

carousel.title: Her-story official: Alex Eala 65-spot ranking rise marks biggest leap in WTA top 100
carousel.description: Alex Eala is officially ranked No. 75 in the latest WTA rankings after an unprecedented giant-killer run in the Miami Open

carousel.title: Inflation slides to nearly 5-year low of 1.8% in March 2025
carousel.description: March inflation was the slowest in nearly five years, or since May 2020—at the height of the most stringent lockdowns at the onset of the Covid-19 pandemic—when the headline rate clocked in at 1.6 percent.
